page.title: 15Life styles,Toppesfield,etc.
page.content: Parents of children attending Toppes- field School and living within the block were questioned about transport and employment.Few local employment opportunities exist and,as public transport facilities are extremely sparse,a high degree of personal mob- ility is required.Most families which responded comprised 2 adults, plus children.All had at least one car and 40% had 2 vehicles.Five of the 30 working adults travelled over 50 miles to work and 3 had mobile jobs.A furth- er 11 people worked from home or with- in walking distance. The survey method inevitably reflects the life style of younger families; many retired people have no personal transport whatsoever. 51% of adults questioned were in whole-time employment, 22% had part- time work and the remainder, mainly mothers,had no paid jobs.
